attributes.action: VIEW ALL OPEN UNIVERSITY STUDENTS STUDYING 90 OR MORE POINTS AS FULL-TIME STUDENTS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: TO STOP DISCRIMINATION AGAINST THESE STUDENTS IN MANY AREAS, AND TO ALLOW THESE STUDENTS RIGHTFUL ACCESS TO STUDENT LOANS AND COUNCIL TAX DISCOUNTS, AND OTHER OPTIONS ONLY AVAILIBLE TO ALL OTHER STUDENTS STUDYING THE SAME NUMBER OF HOURS.

rejection.details: We do not accept petitions composed in CAPITALS as they are very hard for people to read and understand
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
